an9.39:1.2: Tasmiṁ kho pana, bhikkhave, saṅgāme asurā jiniṁsu, devā parājayiṁsu.
an9.39:1.3: Parājitā ca, bhikkhave, devā apayiṁsuyeva uttarenābhimukhā, abhiyiṁsu asurā.
an9.39:1.7: Dutiyampi kho, bhikkhave, devā asurehi saṅgāmesuṁ.
an9.39:1.8: Dutiyampi kho, bhikkhave, asurāva jiniṁsu, devā parājayiṁsu.
an9.39:1.9: Parājitā ca, bhikkhave, devā apayiṁsuyeva uttarenābhimukhā, abhiyiṁsu asurā.
an9.39:2.4: Tatiyampi kho, bhikkhave, devā asurehi saṅgāmesuṁ.
an9.39:2.5: Tatiyampi kho, bhikkhave, asurāva jiniṁsu, devā parājayiṁsu.
an9.39:2.6: Parājitā ca, bhikkhave, devā bhītā devapuraṁyeva pavisiṁsu.
an9.39:2.8: ‘bhīruttānagatena kho dāni mayaṁ etarahi attanā viharāma akaraṇīyā asurehī’ti.
an9.39:2.10: ‘bhīruttānagatena kho dāni devā etarahi attanā viharanti akaraṇīyā amhehī’ti.
an9.39:3.2: Tasmiṁ kho pana, bhikkhave, saṅgāme devā jiniṁsu, asurā parājayiṁsu.
an9.39:3.3: Parājitā ca, bhikkhave, asurā apayiṁsuyeva dakkhiṇenābhimukhā, abhiyiṁsu devā.
an9.39:3.7: Dutiyampi kho, bhikkhave, asurā devehi saṅgāmesuṁ.
an9.39:3.8: Dutiyampi kho, bhikkhave, devā jiniṁsu, asurā parājayiṁsu.
an9.39:3.9: Parājitā ca, bhikkhave, asurā apayiṁsuyeva dakkhiṇenābhimukhā, abhiyiṁsu devā.
an9.39:4.4: Tatiyampi kho, bhikkhave, asurā devehi saṅgāmesuṁ.
an9.39:4.5: Tatiyampi kho, bhikkhave, devā jiniṁsu, asurā parājayiṁsu.
an9.39:4.6: Parājitā ca, bhikkhave, asurā bhītā asurapuraṁyeva pavisiṁsu.
an9.39:4.8: ‘bhīruttānagatena kho dāni mayaṁ etarahi attanā viharāma akaraṇīyā devehī’ti.
an9.39:4.10: ‘bhīruttānagatena kho dāni asurā etarahi attanā viharanti akaraṇīyā amhehī’ti.
an9.39:5.1: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, yasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati,
an9.39:5.2: tasmiṁ, bhikkhave, samaye bhikkhussa evaṁ hoti:
an9.39:5.3: ‘bhīruttānagatena kho dānāhaṁ etarahi attanā viharāmi akaraṇīyo mārassā’ti.
an9.39:5.5: ‘bhīruttānagatena kho dāni bhikkhu etarahi attanā viharati akaraṇīyo mayhan’ti.
an9.39:6.1: Yasmiṁ, bhikkhave, samaye bhikkhu vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā …pe… dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ …
an9.39:6.4: tasmiṁ, bhikkhave, samaye bhikkhussa evaṁ hoti:
an9.39:6.5: ‘bhīruttānagatena kho dānāhaṁ etarahi attanā viharāmi akaraṇīyo mārassā’ti.
an9.39:6.7: ‘bhīruttānagatena kho dāni bhikkhu etarahi attanā viharati, akaraṇīyo mayhan’ti.
an9.39:7.1: Yasmiṁ, bhikkhave, samaye bhikkhu sabbaso rūpasaññānaṁ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṁ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṁ amanasikārā ‘ananto ākāso’ti ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an9.39:7.2: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘bhikkhu antamakāsi māraṁ, apadaṁ vadhitvā māracakkhuṁ adassanaṁ gato pāpimato tiṇṇo loke visattikan’ti.
an9.39:8.1: Yasmiṁ, bhikkhave, samaye bhikkhu sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘anantaṁ viññāṇan’ti viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati …
an9.39:8.2: sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati …
an9.39:8.3: sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati …
an9.39:8.4: sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ upasampajja viharati, paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
an9.39:8.5: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘bhikkhu antamakāsi māraṁ, apadaṁ vadhitvā māracakkhuṁ adassanaṁ gato pāpimato tiṇṇo loke visattikan’”ti.
